titleStmt.title: Commune Concilium tent. vicesimo septimo die Iulii, 1648 forasmuch as this court did apprehend the great danger the Parliament and city is in, in regard of the many commotions in this kingdom, and the distractions thereof ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes printer to the honorable City of London,
